newsitem.title: UK: UK's FTSE 100 soars 2.7 pct in pre-Budget rally.
newsitem.headline: UK's FTSE 100 soars 2.7 pct in pre-Budget rally.

text.p: The UK's FTSE 100 index scored its biggest one-day gain in point terms for five years on Tuesday, in a pre-Budget rally that caught analysts and dealers by surprise after weeks of cautious trading.

The leading share index closed 123.7 points or 2.7 percent higher at 4,728.3, its biggest gain since a rise of 136 points in April 1992 and boosting its value by some 21 billion stg. In percentage terms, the rise was also the biggest since 1992.
Some said the market had looked due for a rally after its recent shaky performance, dogged by worries over the contents of Britain's first budget under a Labour government in 19 years.
